Contributor: Partridge, Bernard, b. 1861, artist.; Kossovo Day Committee, publisher.;
Description: Text says that Kossovo Day which is the Serbian National Day is June 28th 1916. Poster explains the history of Serbia since the Battle of Kossovo in 1389. Illustration which is reproduced from an issue of "Punch," is a battle scene.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Kossovo Day is the Serbian National Day
